FuncDef: The display igmp snooping querier command displays querier configurations. The display igmp snooping querier command displays querier configurations.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays querier configurations in a specified BD. If bd-id is not specified, IGMP querier configurations in all BDs will be displayed.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
The bd-id value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.

Displays querier configurations in a specified VLAN. If vlan-id is not specified, IGMP querier configurations in all VLANs will be displayed.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 4094.
